page.title: All Projects Page
page.no-projects-found-error-title: There seems to be no projects yet!
page.no-projects-found-error-message: Start adding projects to be able to see them here

new-project-page.title: Add Project
new-project-page.description: Enter the details of the project you want to add
new-project-page.name-field-description: Enter the name of the project. This is the name you will be using to search and refer to the project.
new-project-page.type-field-description: Select the type of the project.
new-project-page.status-field-description: Select the status of the project.
new-project-page.client-field-description: Select the client that this project is for.
new-project-page.owner-field-description: Select the user who will be responsible for this project.
new-project-page.description-field-description: Enter a description of the project.
new-project-page.notes-field-description: Enter any notes about the project.

schema.name-min-length: Name must be at least {minLength} characters
schema.name-max-length: Name must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
schema.description-max-length: Description must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
schema.notes-max-length: Notes must not be longer than {maxLength} characters

page.subtitle: This is the project page for {projectName}. Here you can view all information about the project. You can also view the documents and items linked to this project.

edit.title: Edit Project
edit.subtitle: This is the edit page for the project {projectName}. Here you can edit the project details.

status-form.title: Project Status
status-form.description: Update project status to reflect the current state of the project. After selecting the desired state press the update button to persist the change.
status-form.error: An error occurred while updating the status

dates-form.title: Project Dates
dates-form.error: An error occurred while updating dates

owner-form.unauthorized: You do not have permission to change the project owner
owner-form.error: An error occurred while updating the owner
owner-form.title: Project Owner
owner-form.description: Update project owner. After selecting the desired owner press the update button to persist the change.
owner-form.note-content: Only the owner or an admin can change the project owner.

sale-items-page.no-items-found-error-message: There seems to be no sale items linked to this project yet
sale-items-page.title: Project's Sale Items
sale-items-page.subtitle: This is the sale items page for this project.

menu.confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete this item from the project?

purchase-items-page.no-items-found-error-message: There seems to be no purchase items linked to this project yet
purchase-items-page.title: Project's Purchase Items
purchase-items-page.subtitle: This is the purchase items page for this project.

menu.confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete this item from the project?

documents-page.no-documents-found-error-message: There seems to be no documents linked to this project yet
documents-page.title: Project's Documents
documents-page.subtitle: This is a list of the documents linked to the project.

commercial-offer.unauthorized: You are not authorized to view this page

form.error: An error occurred while generating the file
form.title: Commercial Offer
form.description: Generate a commercial offer document for the project
form.company-name-description: Enter the name of your company. This name will be displayed on the commercial offer document.
form.address-description: Enter the address of your company. This address will be displayed on the commercial offer document.
form.country-description: Enter the city and country of your company. This is the country you will be displayed on the commercial offer document.
form.phone-nm-a-description: Enter the primary phone number of your company. This is the phone number will be displayed on the commercial offer document.
form.phone-nm-b-description: Enter the secondary phone number of your company. This is the phone number will be displayed on the commercial offer document.
form.email-description: Enter the email address of your company. This email will be displayed on the commercial offer document.
form.offer-validity-in-days-description: Enter the number of days the offer is valid for. This will be displayed on the commercial offer document terms.
form.payment-advance-description: Enter the percentage of the advance payment. This will be displayed on the commercial offer document terms.
form.delivery-period-description: Enter the delivery period of the project. This will be displayed on the commercial offer document terms.

schema.offer-validity-number: Offer Validity must be a number
schema.payment-advance-number: Advance Percentage must be a number

new-purchase-item-page.no-items-found-error-message: Add items to be able to add purchase items.
new-purchase-item-page.no-suppliers-found-error-message: Add suppliers to be able to add purchase items.
new-purchase-item-page.title: Add Purchase Item
new-purchase-item-page.subtitle: This is the add purchase item page for this project.

form.error: An error occurred while adding the item
form.title: Add Purchase Item
form.description: Enter the details of the purchase item you want to add.
form.item-field-description: Select an item to add to the project. If the item does not exist, you have to create it from the Items tab first.
form.supplier-field-description: Select the supplier to add to the project. If the supplier does not exist, you have to create it from the Suppliers tab first.
form.price-field-description: Enter the price of the item.
form.currency-field-description: Select the currency of the price.
form.quantity-field-description: Enter the quantity of the item.

new-sale-item-page.no-items-found-error-message: Add items to be able to add sale items.

form.error: An error occurred while adding the item
form.title: Add Sale Item
form.description: Enter the details of the sale item you want to add.
form.item-field-description: Select an item to add to the project. If the item does not exist, you have to create it from the Items tab first.
form.price-field-description: Enter the price of the item.
form.currency-field-description: Select the currency of the price.
form.quantity-field-description: Enter the quantity of the item.

comments-page.comment-max: Comment must be less than {max} characters
comments-page.error: An error occurred while adding the comment
comments-page.delete-error: An error occurred while deleting the comment

page.title: All Clients Page
page.no-clients-error-title: There seems to be no clients yet!
page.no-clients-error-description: Start adding clients to be able to see them here.

new-client-page.title: Add Client
new-client-page.description: Enter the details of the client you want to add.
new-client-page.name-field-description: Enter the name of the client. This is the name you will be using to search and refer to the client. It will appear in your projects.
new-client-page.registration-number-field-description: Enter the registration number of the client. Registration number will appear in the card of the client.
new-client-page.website-field-description: Enter the website of the client.
new-client-page.notes-field-description: Enter any notes about the client.
new-client-page.error: An error occurred while adding the client

schema.name-min-length: Name must be at least {minLength} characters
schema.name-max-length: Name must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
schema.registration-number-max-length: Registration number must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
schema.website-max-length: Website must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
schema.notes-max-length: Notes must not be longer than {maxLength} characters

page.title: All Suppliers Page
page.no-suppliers-found-error-title: There seems to be no suppliers yet!
page.no-suppliers-found-error-message: Start adding suppliers to be able to see them here.

new-supplier-page.title: Add Supplier
new-supplier-page.description: Enter the details of the supplier you want to add.
new-supplier-page.name-field-description: Enter the name of the supplier. This is the name you will be using to search and refer to the supplier. It will appear in your projects.
new-supplier-page.field-field-description: Enter the supplier's field of business. This will be used to categorize the supplier and make it easier to search for them.
new-supplier-page.registration-number-field-description: Enter the registration number of the supplier. Registration number will appear in the card of the supplier.
new-supplier-page.website-field-description: Enter the website of the supplier.
new-supplier-page.notes-field-description: Enter any notes about the supplier.
new-supplier-page.error: An error occurred while adding the supplier

schema.name-min-length: Name must be at least {minLength} characters
schema.name-max-length: Name must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
schema.field-min-length: Field of Business must be at least {minLength} characters
schema.field-max-length: Field of Business must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
schema.registration-number-max-length: Registration number must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
schema.website-max-length: Website must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
schema.notes-max-length: Notes must not be longer than {maxLength} characters

form.address-name-description: Enter the name or title of the address. Example: Main Office
form.address-line-description: Enter the address street and number.
form.country-description: Enter the country of the address.
form.city-description: Enter the city of the address.
form.address-notes-description: Enter any notes about the address.

schema.name-min-length: Name must be at least {count} characters
schema.name-max-length: Name must not be longer than {count} characters
schema.address-line-min-length: Address line must be at least {count} characters
schema.address-line-max-length: Address line must not be longer than {count} characters
schema.country-min-length: Country must be at least {count} characters
schema.country-max-length: Country must not be longer than {count} characters
schema.city-max-length: City must not be longer than {count} characters
schema.address-notes-max-length: Address notes must not be longer than {count} characters

form.contact-name-description: Enter the name of the contact.
form.phone-number-description: Enter the phone number of the contact.
form.email-description: Enter the email address of the contact.
form.notes-description: Enter any notes about the contact.

schema.name-min-length: Name must be at least {count} characters
schema.name-max-length: Name must not be longer than {count} characters
schema.phone-number-min-length: Phone number must be at least {count} characters
schema.phone-number-max-length: Phone number must not be longer than {count} characters
schema.email-min-length: Email must be at least {count} characters
schema.email-max-length: Email must not be longer than {count} characters
schema.notes-max-length: Contact notes must not be longer than {count} characters
schema.email-or-phone-required: An email or a phone number are required

name-form.error: An error occurred while updating name
name-form.unauthorized: You do not have permission to change the {type} name
name-form.title: Name
name-form.description: Update {type} name, this will change the name of the name of the {type} across all references. After typing the updated name press the update button to persist the change. Name of the {type} must be unique.
name-form.note-with-owner: Only the owner or an admin can change the {type} name.
name-form.note-without-owner: Only an admin can change the {type} name.

description-form.error: An error occurred while updating description
description-form.title: Description
description-form.description: Update {type} description, this will change the description of the {type} across all references. After typing the updated description press the update button to persist the change. The {type} description is one of the fields used to search {type}s.

notes-form.error: An error occurred while updating notes
notes-form.title: Notes
notes-form.description: Update {type} notes, this will change the notes of the {type} across all references and the previous notes will be lost. After typing the updated notes press the update button to persist the change.

delete-form.required: Name is required to delete the {type}
delete-form.unauthorized: You do not have permission to delete the {type}
delete-form.title: Delete
delete-form.description: Are you sure you want to delete the {type}? This action cannot be undone.

form-info.description: Please type the name of the {type} to confirm. After typing the name press the delete button to delete the {type}.
form-info.warning-content: Deleting a {type} is permanent, you will not be able to undo this action.
form-info.project-note-content: Only an admin or an owner can delete a project.
form-info.note-content: Only an admin can delete a {type}.

drop-zone.title: Click to upload
drop-zone.subtitle: or drag and drop
drop-zone.error: File size must be less than {max} MB

new-document-form.name-min-length: Name must be at least {minLength} characters
new-document-form.name-max-length: Name must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
new-document-form.notes-max-length: Notes must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
new-document-form.error: An error occurred while adding document
new-document-form.title: Add Document
new-document-form.name-field-description: Enter the name of the document. This is the name you will be using to search and refer to the document.
new-document-form.private-field-description: Check this box if you want to make the document private. Only users with the appropriate permissions will be able to access the document.
new-document-form.notes-field-description: Enter any notes about the document.

existing-document-form.error: An error occurred while adding document
existing-document-form.title: Add Existing Document
existing-document-form.id-field-description: Select the document you want to link. After selecting the document, press submit to link the document.

menu.unlink-error: An error occurred while unlinking document
